title: The Heartbreak of Janis Joplin
description: The tale of the many muses of Janis Joplin and her insatiable hunger for love.

title: The Legacy of the Dead
description: An in depth look to what the Dead have been able to achieve over the years and the legacy they leave behind.

title: Lennon, and His Eight Nights a Week
description: A history of Lennon's early days with the Beatles playing in Hamburg 8 hours a night, 7 days a week, and how that shaped the talent behind the genius.
